title: Define Project Scope and Goals
description: Clearly outline the project's objectives, target audience, and the specific areas of supply chain operations to be optimized.

title: Design Architecture for Simulation Tool
description: Create a high-level design of the simulation tool, including the structure, components, and interactions between them.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the simulation tool, making it intuitive and easy to use.

title: Develop Backend Services and Algorithms
description: Implement the backend services, APIs, and optimization algorithms necessary for the simulation tool.

title: Integrate Database and Data Management System
description: Set up a database to store simulation data and implement a system for managing, loading, and processing this data.

title: Implement DevOps and CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a robust DevOps process, including continuous integration and deployment, to ensure smooth development and updates.
dependencies: Integrate Database and Data Management System

title: Conduct Quality Assurance Tests
description: Perform extensive testing to ensure the simulation tool is functioning correctly under various scenarios.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation detailing the project's design, functionality, and usage instructions.
